text: "God Bless the Child" is a popular jazz ballad. It was first written in 1939 though not released until 1942. Billie Holiday sang the first version. Lisa Simpson (voiced by Yeardley Smith), made this ballad more popular in 1990-1991. Category:1940s songs Category:Jazz songs Category:Billie Holiday songs Category:1941 songs Category:1942 works Category:1939 songs
title: God Bless the Child
